meaningMnemonic: In the event of a <radical>tsunami</radical>, <radical>Wolverine</radical>, your <radical>forehead</radical>, and a <radical>stool</radical> will all be <kanji>immersed</kanji> in it. You will become immersed in the tsunami after it hits because tsunamis are gigantic and bring a lot of water. Now you and your forehead are immersed in the tsunami along with Wolverine and a stool.
readingMnemonic: Still <kanji>immersed</kanji>, the stool floats over and hits you in the <reading>shin</reading> (しん). The tsunami gave the stool a good push and while it was fully immersed, it ran into your shin. It really hurts.
